com.yugandhar.common.util

Class YugandharEncoderDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yugandhar.common.util.YugandharEncoderDecoder

  • public class YugandharEncoderDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Yugandhar Encoder and Decoder utility. The base64 encoder is used to encode the string
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Yugandhar

      This is utility main method to encode or decode the string YugandharEncoderDecoder Arguments: 1: Required: operation name valid values 'encode/decode' 2: Required: input String valid values: any UTF-8 complaint String Example: YugandharEncoderDecoder encode mypassword Example: YugandharEncoderDecoder decode bXlwYXNzd29yZA==

        public java.lang.String encodeString(java.lang.String inputString)
        This method encodes the input string
        Parameters:
        String - input String to be encoded. The base64 encoder is used to encode the string
        Returns:
        String encoded string as per base64 encoding

      • decodeString

        public java.lang.String decodeString(java.lang.String inputString)
        This method decodes the input string
        Parameters:
        String - input String to be decoded. The base64 decoder is used to decode the string
        Returns:
        String decoded string as per base64 encoding
        Since:
        1.0

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is utility main method to encode or decode the string YugandharEncoderDecoder Arguments: 1: Required: operation name valid values 'encode/decode' 2: Required: input String valid values: any UTF-8 complaint String Example: YugandharEncoderDecoder encode mypassword Example: YugandharEncoderDecoder decode bXlwYXNzd29yZA==
        Parameters:
        String[] - String array having Operation Name and String to be encoded/decoded
        Since:
        2.0
